actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress concerning contraceptives for women.

summary.text: Expresses support for: (1) a national campaign to help all women, regardless of income, avoid unintended pregnancy and abortion through access to contraception; and (2) programs and policies that make it easier for women to obtain contraceptives and use them consistently and correctly.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress concerning contraceptives for women.
